newsitem.title: USA: Zonagen says Vasomax did well in study.
newsitem.headline: Zonagen says Vasomax did well in study.

text.p: Zonagen Inc said on Friday that Vasomax, its oral treatment for male erectile dysfunction, performed well in its second Phase 3 clinical trial.

In a double-blinded, placebo-controlled study involving 293 men, 34 percent responded to a 40-miligram dose of Vasomax, compared to 21 percent. That was a statistically significant improvement, the company said in a news release.
No serious adverse events were reported, Zonagen added.
Zonagen is a biopharmaceutical company focusing on conditions and diseases associated with the human reproductive system.
Zonagen shares were up 3/4 to 22-5/8 in mid-morning trading.
